features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Phone-based OTP authentication system using Supabase Auth. Includes login screen with phone number input, OTP verification screen, and authentication state management.

features.name: Onboarding Flow
features.description: Multi-page onboarding experience for first-time users with animated transitions and skip functionality. Stores onboarding completion status in SharedPreferences.

features.name: Home Screen
features.description: Main home screen with service discovery interface. Features search functionality, service categories grid, promotional banners, and bottom navigation bar with Home, Bookings, Chat, and Profile sections.

features.name: Theme System
features.description: Custom theme configuration with Moroccan-inspired color palette (red, blue, yellow, green). Includes Material Design 3 theming, custom text styles using Google Fonts, and gradient definitions.

features.name: Zellij Background Widget
features.description: Custom decorative background widget that renders traditional Moroccan Zellij (geometric tile) pattern using CustomPainter. Provides visual branding throughout the app.

features.name: Service Categories
features.description: Service category data model and predefined list of 12 service categories including Plumber, Electrician, Cleaning, Mechanic, Hair/Beauty, Painting, Moving, Gardening, Tech Repair, Laundry, Delivery, and Vet/Pet services.

features.name: User Profile Management
features.description: User profile CRUD operations including fetching user profile from Supabase profiles table, and updating profile with full name and avatar URL.

features.name: Service Management
features.description: Service data operations to fetch and list services from Supabase services table, ordered by name.

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin interface screen for super admin users to manage the platform.

features.name: Provider Dashboard
features.description: Service provider dashboard interface for service providers to manage their services and bookings.

features.name: App Constants
features.description: Application-wide constants including Supabase configuration (URL and anon key), app name, and admin phone number.

features.name: App Initialization
features.description: Main application entry point with Supabase initialization, Provider setup for state management, and authentication wrapper that handles routing between onboarding, login, and home screens based on user state.
